name: ChanceMan
description:
The game was made entirely by 

Ahmed Alfiki (Fiki). 

Made with the Unity game engine in 2 days as a part of the GMTK 2022 game jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice".

It's a top-down shooter arcade game in which you throw playing cards at some dicey gentlemen. and your main goal is to confront your evil nemesis, who is extremely umm... evil.

Well, the game is very random in many ways, but it also has some cool vibes, so please give it a try and give me your feedback.

Mechanics

the game is like a micro rogue-like where you enter 6 different doors with random rooms to try and find the key to the boss's room.

your character shoot playing cards at Dice looking enemies with different stats until you reach the end.

Controls

W A S D — Move The Character

MOUSE — Aim and shoot

E — Action

SPACE —  Jump

ESC — Pause Menu / Quit game
